manifest_description.message: Hides the duration and title of videos on Twitch.tv to prevent spoilers when watching e-sports or sports videos.

playerShowHideDuration_visible.description: Label of the Show/Hide Duration button for the visible state.

playerShowHideDuration_hidden.description: Label of the Show/Hide Duration button for the hidden state.

playerJumpBackward.description: Label of the Jump Backward button.

playerJumpForward.description: Label of the Jump Forward button.

playerJump_help.message: Time jump format: "2" for 2 minutes or "1h2m3s" for 1 hour, 2 minutes and 3 seconds
playerJump_help.description: The help message to be displayed for the Jump Distance input.

playerJump_err.description: The error message to be displayed if the Jump Distance is invalid.

videoListItemShowHideTitle_visible.description: Label of the Show/Hide Title button for the visible state.

videoListItemShowHideTitle_hidden.description: Label of the Show/Hide Title button for the visible state.

videoListItemShowHidePreview_visible.description: Label of the Show/Hide Preview button for the visible state.

videoListItemShowHidePreview_hidden.description: Label of the Show/Hide Preview button for the visible state.

videoListItemShowHideDuration_visible.description: Label of the Show/Hide Duration button for the visible state.

videoListItemShowHideDuration_hidden.description: Label of the Show/Hide Duration button for the visible state.

menu_openOptions.description: Label of the Options... button on the browser_action popup menu.

options_sfm_enabled.description: Label of the Enable Spoiler-Free Mode options section.

options_sfm_enabled_never.description: Label of the Never Enable Spoiler-Free Mode option.

options_sfm_enabled_always.description: Label of the Always Enable Spoiler-Free Mode option.

options_sfm_enabled_custom.description: Label of the Custom Enable Spoiler-Free Mode option.

options_sfm_channelToAdd.description: Label of the Channel To Add text input tooltip.

options_sfm_addChannel.description: Label of the Add Channel button.

options_sfm_channels.description: Label of the Channels text area tooltip.

options_sfm_removeChannels.description: Label of the Remove Channels button.

options_sfm_configure.description: Label of the Configure Spoiler-Free Mode options section.

options_sfm_player.description: Label of the Player options sub-section.

options_sfm_player_hideDuration.description: Label of the Hide Duration option.

options_sfm_player_jumpDistance.description: Label of the Jump Distance option.

options_sfm_videoList.description: Label of the Video List options sub-section.

options_sfm_videoList_hideTitle.description: Label of the Hide Title option.

options_sfm_videoList_hidePreview.description: Label of the Hide Preview option.

options_sfm_videoList_hideDuration.description: Label of the Hide Duration option.

options_general.description: Label of the General options section.

options_general_theatreMode.description: Label of the Player: Theatre Mode option.

options_twitch.description: Label of the Twitch options section.

options_save_successMsg.description: Message to be displayed after a successful Save action.

options_save_errorMsg.description: Message to be displayed after a failed Save action.

options_restoreDefaults.description: Label of the Restore Defaults button.

options_restoreDefaults_successMsg.description: Message to be displayed after a successful Restore Defaults action.

browserAction_sfmCustom_platformEnabled.description: The label of the checkbox whether the SFM should be enabled for this platform

browserAction_sfmCustom_channelEnabled.description: The label of the checkbox whether the SFM should be enabled for this channel
